title: Zimbabwe introduces gold-backed currency to combat inflation
description: Zimbabwe has taken a significant step in addressing its ongoing currency challenges by introducing a new foreign exchange and gold-backed "structured currency."

title: Genesis buys $2.1b of Bitcoin after selling 36m GBTC shares
description: Troubled crypto lending firm Genesis has reportedly bought $2.1 billion worth of Bitcoin (BTC) after selling off approximately 36 million shares of the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC).
